General.Name: Baron Oil PLC
General.Description: Baron Oil Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas reserves, and other related activities in South America, South East Asia, and the United Kingdom. The company holds 75% interest in Timor-Leste TL-SO-19-16 PSC offshore license located in Southeast Asia. It also owns 100% interest in onshore license Block XXI located in Peru, as well as 32% interest in P2478 offshore license located in the United Kingdom. Baron Oil Plc was incorporated in 2004 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
